summary: A terrorist places an atom bomb somewhere in an American metropolis. The president of the U.S. has no other choice; he has to call Delta Force.
cast: Nick Cassavetes|Eric Douglas|Mike Norris|Matthew Penn|John Saint Ryan|Hanna Azoulay Hasfari|Gregory Tal|Mark Ivanir|Candace Brecker|Dan Turgeman|Jonathan Cherchi|Sandy Ward|Jonathan Arkin|Kevin Patterson|Baruch Dror|Mark Mason|Claude Aviram|Natan Sgan-Cohen|Jeff Gerner|Daniel Diker|Jacques Cohen|Ike Seamans|Irving Kaplan|John Dicks|John Phillips|Sigal Harari|Gabi Shoshan|Avi Cohen|Elad Katlan|Eitan Milgram|Jerry Heiman|Yaacov Cohen|Albert Iluz|Tikva Aziz|Larry Price|Michael Morim|Dov Peleg|Yosef Barel|Ofer Levi|David Shamul|Joel Drori|Ya'ackov Banai|Roni Akrish
title: Delta Force 3
